    • About Robert Mack


    I’ve been a realtor for 13 years. I spent the first 7 years of my real estate career just trying to figure this business out. Made mistakes, learned from them, and constantly looking for ways to perfect my craft, be different, and be better. I had no mentor or guidance, I just had to figure it out on my own. Now I’m among the top 5% of realtors in the country. In addition to serving my clients at the highest level, I’ve now become a team leader and one of my passions is to mentor and guide newer agents to be more successful in less time by helping them learn more through all the mistakes I made! If you are a new or solo agent struggling to create a consistent business model, and you’re looking to be a part of something bigger, I would love the opportunity to have a strategy session with you to see if you would be the right fit for the Robert Mack Group! Real estate has many moving parts, and my goal is to create a team of agents who thrive at the highest level but also have a life worth living.
